title: What are the saddest songs by Billie Eilish? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Billie Eilish I know is from her former years. When her then song - Six feet under had come out, she was hardly 15 years old. This song holds a special place because she sings about death so effortlessly and sweetly, so much that the idea of death ceases to appear as dreadful - but almost as a mellow haunting, coming from her.  I am not that a big fan of her present music - surely she has evolved her style and since only grown bigger & better as a human/artist, but it just doesn’t keep me as invested as her old songs did. Until then this stays as my most fav song of hers and I don’t see that changing anytime soon.

Lovely - it’s about depression and in the official music video billie and khalid were trapped in a box w/ a storm over them bc that’s what it feels like. Everything I wanted - In her dream, she was gonna commit suicide and her friends didn’t care.. but she woke up to see her brother by her side and he’ll always be there for her. Six feet under - It’s a reference to someone who was loved, and they died.
